extendedInfo.description: Beautiful Butterfly is a Live Wallpaper.After you have downloaded and installed it,  You need in order to set it  as a Live Wallpaper:- go to your home screen;- press the menu button on your device;- select "Wallpaper";- select "Live Wallpapers";- search and select for this Live Wallpaper"- select "Settings" to see the settings or select "Set wallpaper" to activate it.System Requirement:any phone that came with Android OS 2.0 or later should work fine. Anything that came with 1.5 / 1.6 may have problemsSome info regards ads into this appWe want to keep the app completely free, In order to keep the app 100% free is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray and/or home screen. This will help keep this app 100% free and help us bring you more cool apps like this in the future.You can delete the search shortcuts easily and without any effect for our app. (Drag & Drop to the garbage).You can optout notification ads from:Leadbolt Optout: http://opt.leadbolt.com/SendDroid Optout: http://senddroid.com/opt-out/Airpush Optout : http://www.airpush.com/optoutTags:Beautiful Butterfly Live wallpapers Blue Black Flower

reviews.comment: Beautiful,  but far too many ads about how to hook up with Hot Locals!\tBeautifully done; however,  since the recent update,  I\'ve been receiving way too much spam.  Sadly,  I am deleting this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: Animation is somewhat jerky, mediocre graphic quality, was immediately prompted with push notifications for other apps. I\'d much rather have the still image with no ads, as the colors are gorgeous, but the cons outweigh the pros.
reviews.author: A Google User
